description: Bryan ... Bryan is a true mans man that I'm sure turns heads everywhere he goes. Mike says one of the best things about Bryan is that he's very approachable even though he's so good looking. There's nothing like a hot hunky Marine that is very approachable. At first glance, I saw the epitome of the gallant and long-standing image of a true, hot and horny Marine in Bryan. I was instantly taken by his looks. Watching him on video is surreal. Trust me; you're gonna really like this fine specimen on your TV doing his thing just for you. He's beefy and sexy in such a masculine way. He reminds me of Dean in some ways with his sexy hairy legs and that gorgeous body that he obviously puts some work into at the gym. Bryan was one of the first of Mike's guys that he showed me and you can see why I was instantly captivated and wanted more, More, MORE!
title: Bryan (Mike's man)
